entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 a.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 50 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:40 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 9:40 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:40 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
